remarks: The vector sum operation for the final constructed Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hlhil0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hlhil0.l $e |- L = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhil0.u $e |- U = ( ( HLHil ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhil0.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hlhillsm.a $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` L ) $.
hlhillsm $p |- ( ph -> .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) ) $.
